15:09 <tekzilla> should it be possible to make a fresh install of xwiki and copy back (with a script) docs/users/attachments from another sql database dump of the same version ?  
15:09 <tekzilla> my current install is completely shot, i dont see the export facility in the admin area to export the wiki  
15:10 <tekzilla> any suggestions on how to get the broken install to at least export the content would also be great
